minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both team building & hiring and technology infrastructure & scaling today.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: We're facing similar API integration challenges. Let's share learnings.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the accuracy issues and expect CAC to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for POC? It worked for us.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Actually, let me clarify... our model drift is showing 92% accuracy, and the CAC is improving.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: We're facing similar model drift challenges. Let's share learnings.
